description:
Defect  found in folsom release

Able to create image with special characters and not raised error message

Steps:

1)  Create ab image with special character:

$curl -i http://15.184.83.251:8774/v2/5e8e6e11adf74ee5b9141d4c6c5fad94//servers/a14102b5-b165-4d56-954b-77f5678de3a4/action -X POST -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: nova_auto_project" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" -H "X-Auth-Token: 89d2063df4f04014bb04b0575e15de78" -d '{"createImage": {"name": "#$%^&!", "metadata": {"ImageVersion": "2.0", "ImageType": "Gold"}}}'
HTTP/1.1 202 Accepted
Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8
Content-Length: 0
Location: http://15.184.83.251:8774/v2/5e8e6e11adf74ee5b9141d4c6c5fad94/images/b886b5fc-b8a4-491e-8e15-2736bbf09ecb
Date: Thu, 02 Aug 2012 07:37:43 GMT

2) check above created image

[murali_koripally@pshys0286 ~]$nova image-list | grep "#"
| b886b5fc-b8a4-491e-8e15-2736bbf09ecb | #$%^&!                          | SAVING | a14102b5-b165-4d56-954b-77f5678de3a4 |
[murali_koripally@pshys0286 ~]$

Actual result: Image gets created with special characters
Expected result: Image create with special character should return error message
title: Creating Image with name as special characters does not raise any error message
